title: Can Taurus and Virgo Be Friends? Everything You Need to Know

steps.title: It can start slow, but Taurus and Virgo can form a strong and long lasting friendship.
steps.content: It can start slow, but Taurus and Virgo can form a strong and long lasting friendship. Both the stubborn Taurus and the shy, reserved Virgo prefer to keep their friend circle small and can find it hard to open up to new people. However, once these 2 Earth signs start talking, they quickly realize they’re on the same page about their values and interests. What really makes this friendship work is that they both know you have to put in time and effort into a relationship—which comes naturally to both of them! The few differences these 2 have can really complement each other. Taurus is ruled by Venus, who loves indulgence and beauty. This can help slow down and mellow out Virgo’s perfectionism and critical tendencies. [1] X Research source On the flip side, Virgo is ruled by Mercury, the planet of communication. Virgo can teach Taurus how to be more curious, exacting, and help them pay attention to the details.

steps.title: Both Taurus and Virgo are driven and goal oriented.
steps.content: Both Taurus and Virgo are driven and goal oriented. You won’t find a happier pair than these 2 practical Earth signs poring over their career and financial goals. As friends, Taurus and Virgo happily cheer each other on and learn from each other's strengths to achieve their dreams. Virgo’s analytical mind and critical eye helps Taurus catch mistakes while Taurus’ perseverance and dedication teaches Virgo to stick it out through hard times. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Taurus and Virgo are practical and down to earth.
steps.content: Taurus and Virgo are practical and down to earth. Earth signs are extremely sensible and understand the importance of setting down a solid foundation in order to grow and succeed. While Taurus and Virgo are both ambitious for success, they know that it only comes from hard work and dedication. And at the end of the day, these Earth signs just want security. [3] X Research source The grounded and sensible natures of these signs also makes them great advice givers. You might catch the pair talking for hours about the importance of saving and investing for the future, which they are happy to share with others.

steps.title: Virgos and Taureans keep their promises and are always there for a friend in need.
steps.content: Virgos and Taureans keep their promises and are always there for a friend in need. These 2 Earth signs are warm and giving in a friendship because they take the effort and time to maintain it. Taurus’ fixed nature means they always follow through on their plans. Virgo’s conscientiousness and exacting behavior means they honor their commitments, while their mutable nature makes them more agreeable to changes and spontaneity, unlike Taurus. [4] X Research source If a Virgo and Taurus make plans—probably for a fancy dinner out followed by a cozy movie night in—they won’t flake out. In fact, they will show up exactly on time. [5] X Research source

steps.title: While it can take time to build trust, Virgo and Taurus have each other’s backs.
steps.content: While it can take time to build trust, Virgo and Taurus have each other’s backs. Loyalty is huge for both Virgo and Taurus due to their shared Earth placement. The reserved Virgo and the inflexible Taurus don’t give out their friendship easily, but once you’re in their inner circle, they’re likely to be your first call in a crisis because they know how to show up. [6] X Research source Taurus is generally warmer and is more likely to reach out to friends and offer a helping hand. Virgo is the more reserved one, but once you have their hard-earned trust, you have a friend for life. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Taurus’ rigidity and stubbornness can become a problem for Virgo.
steps.content: Taurus’ rigidity and stubbornness can become a problem for Virgo. While these signs share an Earth placement, Taurus’ fixed sign means they won’t budge on their routines while Virgo is mutable and craves change. Annoyance and tension is likely when Virgo suggests they go out on Friday night but Taurus refuses to ditch their regular sushi and reality TV binge date. [8] X Research source To get along better and learn from each other, these 2 signs need to learn how to compromise. This is hard for the exacting Virgo and stubborn Taurus, but with communication and trust, they can make the friendship work. Reader Poll: We asked 827 wikiHow readers what the most negative traits in Taureans are, and 56% of them said stubbornness and resistance to change. [Take Poll]

steps.title: They might be at odds over the importance of things versus ideas.
steps.content: They might be at odds over the importance of things versus ideas. Taurus is ruled by the planet Venus, which means Taurus loves indulging in self-care, enjoying fine meals, and status symbols like designer clothes and jewelry. Virgo, on the other hand, is ruled by Mercury. They are constantly thinking and concerned about data and facts. Taurus might find Virgo too uptight and serious, while Virgo can think Taurus is superficial and lazy. [9] X Research source To maintain a great friendship, Taurus and Virgo need to understand that a healthy dose of each quality can make them better. Taurus can show Virgo that it’s okay to relax and enjoy the finer things in life, while Virgo can teach Taurus a thing or 2 about using information and discipline to get what they want.
